name: CPG Media
tagline: Helping You in the Business of Making Money
description:
CPG Media has been assisting small to medium-sized companies with business coaching and digital marketing help since 2008.
Our expertise has helped many owners & management teams find a more fluid and purposeful direction - a way forward that makes sense in the 21st century. We take pride in offering innovative solutions to help your business create goals and achieve success.
Every business is in the business of making cash. To help with that, we have built a comprehensive team including several expert coaches with specialties in:
Cashflow management, budgeting, marketing, human resource management, financial and strategic planning, project management, sales generation, business structure and core business planning.
Digital marketing strategy, web development, search engine optimization, online lead generation, digital campaign goal setting & benchmarks.
